page.title: 07EMPLOYMENT,K.UNDERWOOD cont.
page.content:
Consumer goods and services are also catered for within the area: a couple who own a Sleaford shoe shop, a home- based Christmas cracker maker, sewing machinist making toys at home, nanny, hairdresser and a part-time domestic.
Two people are specifically involved in the new field of technology; a computer programmer working in Peter- borough and a student studying within the field of computer studies.
There are five unemployed males in the area which represents 10% of the work- ing population.
Twentyeight retired people live in the area. Most are active members of the community undertaking voluntary work for the church and local charities.
